      • create

        public void create()
            throws java.io.IOException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: KeybasedRouting
        Binds the sockets and create a singleton network
        定義:
        create インタフェース内 KeybasedRouting
        例外:

      • join

        public void join(java.util.Collection<java.net.URI> bootstraps)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: KeybasedRouting
        After we have a singleton network we can expand it using join. Note that joining another singleton network will merge the 2 singleton into one new network with 2 nodes in it. URI format must be: openkad.udp://[ip of known node]:[port of that node]/
        定義:
        join インタフェース内 KeybasedRouting
        パラメータ:
        bootstraps - all the known nodes in the other network

      • findNode

        public java.util.List<Node> findNode(Key k)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: KeybasedRouting
        Finds nodes with keys closest to the given key (using XOR metric). The list may be any size between 1 and openkad.bucket.kbuckets.maxsize
        定義:
        findNode インタフェース内 KeybasedRouting
        パラメータ:
        k - the desired key
        戻り値:
        nodes with keys close to k

        定義:

        戻り値:
        the keyFactory used for this Keybased Routing

        A list of all known nodes. Changing the returned list will have no affect on the Key Based Routing

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String tag,
                     MessageHandler handler)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: KeybasedRouting
        Registers a MessageHandler for receiving messages sent with a particular tag. All incoming messages and requests sent with the given tag will cause handler.onIncomingMessage or handler.inIncomingRequest invocation. The thread pool used to execute this invocation is openkad.executors.client Invoking register with the same tag more than once will remove the previous handler and use only the new handler
        定義:
        register インタフェース内 KeybasedRouting
        パラメータ:
        tag - the sent messages tag
        handler - the handler used for the incoming message.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Node to,
                        java.lang.String tag,
                        java.io.Serializable msg)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: KeybasedRouting
        Sends any serializable object to the destination node. The destination node must register a MessageHandler for the same tag if it wants to receive the sent message. This method is not designed for sending large object and does not guarantee reliability. Thus, use it to send small messages (like "please connect to me in this (ip, port)"). Note: the destination node must be created using findeNode method. Although it can be transfered using sendMessage or sendRequest to another node and used there.
        定義:
        sendMessage インタフェース内 KeybasedRouting
        パラメータ:
        to - the destination node
        tag - message tag to be used in the destination node for invoking the correct handler
        msg - any arbitrary object
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - failed to send due to some socket error

      • sendRequest

        public java.util.concurrent.Future<java.io.Serializable> sendRequest(Node to,
                                                                     java.lang.String tag,
                                                                     java.io.Serializable msg)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: KeybasedRouting
        Sends a message to the destination node and expects a response. The response is whatever the destination's node MessageHandler.onIncomingRequest has returned. This method is blocking ! the maximum number of outstanding requests (requests which the corresponding responses haven't arrived yet) is openkad.net.concurrency. Thus, if you try to send more than this number sendRequest will block until some responses are received (or timed out). The response can be retrieved using Future.get() method Important: if you send messages to yourself (destination node = local node) than make sure the concurrency factor (openkad.net.concurrency) is smaller than the number of client threads (openkad.executors.client), otherwise you can have a deadlock.
        定義:
        sendRequest インタフェース内 KeybasedRouting
        パラメータ:
        to - the destination node
        tag - message tag to be used in the destination node for invoking the correct handler
        msg - any arbitrary object
        戻り値:
        a future with the response as return by the destination node's MessageHandler.onIncomingRequest method

      • sendRequest

        public <A> void sendRequest(Node to,
                            java.lang.String tag,
                            java.io.Serializable msg,
                            A attachment,
                            CompletionHandler<java.io.Serializable,A> handler)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: KeybasedRouting
        Sends a message to the destination node and expects a response. The response is whatever the destination's node MessageHandler.onIncomingRequest has returned. This method is blocking ! the maximum number of outstanding requests (requests which the corresponding responses haven't arrived yet) is openkad.net.concurrency. Thus, if you try to send more than this number sendRequest will block until some responses are received (or timed out). The response will be received by calling the given handler completed method. It is guaranteed that either handler.completed or handler.failed will be called after the timeout defined in openkad.net.timeout
        定義:
        sendRequest インタフェース内 KeybasedRouting
        パラメータ:
        to - the destination node
        tag - message tag to be used in the destination node for invoking the correct handler
        msg - any arbitrary object
        attachment - the argument to be given to the handler when invoked
        handler - the handler to be invoked upon completion

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        例外:
        java.lang.Exception

        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: KeybasedRouting
